blogPost.excerpt: Chamath Abs Calculator is the perfect tool for your VC starter kit. While you have been going crazy about making sense of the markets and coins, what you don’t know is that only 150 people run the world and some of them are ripped AF.
blogPost.body: Chamath Abs Calculator is the perfect tool for your VC starter kit. While you have been going crazy about making sense of the markets and coins, what you don’t know is that only 150 people run the world and some of them are ripped AF.
blogPost.title: Chamath Abs Calculator - Calculate how long will you take to get SixPAC ab'ed
blogPost.author: Atharva Kharbade

localize.description: Chamath Abs计算器是您VC入门套件的完美工具。当你一直在疯狂地了解市场和币的意义时，你不知道的是，只有150人在管理这个世界，其中一些人是撕裂的AF。
localize.tagline: 计算一下你需要多长时间才能让SixPAC堕胎。

localize.description: Chamath Abs計算器是您VC入門套件的完美工具。當你一直在瘋狂地瞭解市場和幣的意義時，你不知道的是，只有150人在管理這個世界，其中一些人是撕裂的AF。
localize.tagline: 計算一下你需要多長時間才能讓SixPAC墮胎。

previous.excerpt: Browse the best parts of your favorite shows, and enjoy a bite-sized method to discover new ones, via a personalized feed of 60-second highlights generated based on your existing library and interests.
previous.title: Podz - The best parts of podcasts in a personalized feed

localize.description: 浏览您最喜爱的节目中最精彩的部分，并通过根据您现有的资料库和兴趣生成的60秒精彩内容的个性化馈送，享受发现新节目的比特大小方法。
localize.tagline: 个性化喂养中播客的精华部分

localize.description: 瀏覽您最喜愛的節目中最精彩的部分，並通過根據您現有的資料庫和興趣生成的60秒精彩內容的個性化饋送，享受發現新節目的比特大小方法。

next.excerpt: Dual-pane file manager Commander One combines secure FTP client for Mac as well as cloud computing manager features and provides you with the built-in Mac Terminal emulator making it easy for you to manage all the system processes.
next.title: Commander One 3.0 - Dual-pane file manager and FTP client for Mac

localize.description: 双窗格文件管理器Commander One结合了Mac的安全FTP客户端以及云计算管理器功能，并为您提供内置的Mac Terminal模拟器，使您可以轻松管理所有系统进程。
localize.tagline: Mac的双窗格文件管理器和FTP客户端

localize.description: 雙窗格文件管理器Commander One結合了Mac的安全FTP客戶端以及雲計算管理器功能，併爲您提供內置的Mac Terminal模擬器，使您可以輕鬆管理所有系統進程。
localize.tagline: Mac的雙窗格文件管理器和FTP客戶端
